text: What are you doing, get your hands off me~
Mouse...the mouse is in the wrong place!
What are you doing?
Meow meow meow?
Afraid (ノ≧∇≦)ノ
Molestation ah! Help!
In that case, we can only use force!
I'm going to be angry.
Don't move your hand!
Really...really shameless!
Pervert!
This corner isn't cozy at all!
Move me to the other corner!
Do you want to play airplane battle?
This button says 'Don't click'.
What, you want to come play a game with me?
I heard you can dance like this!
You don't love me anymore, do you?
Want to meet my sister?
Want to see my sister?
Want to switch to the poster girl?
Like to play dress up?
What are you going to play this time?
Dress up!
Let's see what happens next!
You want to take a picture of me? One, two, three ~ Cheese ~
Why don't we take a picture together!
How about we take a group photo!
Just keep smiling~
Want to know more about me?
The history of my moving is recorded here.
What do you want to know more about me?
Is it time to say goodbye?
Ugh QAQ, see you later...
Don't abandon me...
Can we meet again...
Hmph, you'll regret it!
It's...it's an accidental touch, isn't it...
What's a lolita?
Have you seen my bear?
If you touch me again, I will call the police! ⌇●﹏●⌇
110, there is a pervert here who keeps touching me (ó﹏ò｡)
Do not touch me, I will tell my wife to beat you!
Why are you touching me? I'll bite you!
Don't touch me, what's there to touch!

seasons.text: New Year's Day is here, a new year has begun~
It's Valentine's Day again, have you found a partner yet~
Today is Arbor Day, protect the environment!
I'll tell you a secret~ Today is April Fools' Day, don't be fooled~
Today is Labor Day, have you planned where to go for the holiday~
It's Children's Day. The time for fun is always short... Wouldn't it be nice to never grow up...
The Victory Day of the Chinese People's War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression, remember history, cherish the memory of the martyrs, cherish peace and create the future.
Teacher's Day, say hello to your teacher at school~
Who did you spend this year's Double Eleven with~
It's Christmas these days, the owner must have gone shopping again~

time.text: Good morning! A good day is about to begin!
Good morning! I hope your work goes well. Don’t sit for too long. Get up and walk around more!
It's noon, after working for a whole morning, it's now lunch time!
It's easy to get sleepy in the late afternoon, have you accomplished your exercise goals for the day?
It's evening! The sunset outside the window is very beautiful. The most beautiful thing is the red sunset~
Good evening, how are you today?

text: It's already so late, go to bed early, good night~
Take care of your eyes late at night!

time.text: Are you a night owl? You're still up so late. How can you get up tomorrow?

default: It's been a long time, the days have flown by...
Bad villain! How long have you been ignoring me, eh~
Punch your chest with a small fist!
Remember to add Xiaojia to your favorites!
message.console: Haha, you opened the console to see my little secret?
message.copy: What did you copy? Remember to add the source when reprinting!
